Reviews.Title: “Unremarkable lodging at the right price”
Reviews.Author: tomcat408
Reviews.Content: hotel louisiana hotel 4th floor building typically european clean lift required multiple trips luggage minor inconvenience staff helpful entirely engaging breakfast usual italian breakfast fruits coffee etc reasonable walk city bus route hop hop bus la repubblica metro main complaint noise street below ristorante located nearby rowdy crowd kept wee hours memorable clean price reasonable short 23 day stay fine wouldnt stay extended visit

Reviews.Title: “Cheap, convenient location to train station, decent walk to tourist sites”
Reviews.Author: kcrain
Reviews.Content: stayed hotel louisiana nights weekend rome decent town convenient location walk train kilometer reception desk upstairs strange perfectly labelled elevator haul luggage hotel staff adequately helpful wouldnt service awards clean furniture cheap easily breakable scuff marks walls easily spruced paint bathroom shower head leaky accordion doors didnt stay closed water temperature fluctuated bit shower stall european hotels weve stayed wifi available common little finicky connect usually waiting outdoor center building nice sitting relaxing evening checking email smokers mosquitos hinder enjoyment included breakfast pretty light compared hotels sufficient

Reviews.Title: “Cheap hotel for Rome”
Reviews.Author: Sonecika
Reviews.Content: hotel central situated 5 min subway line station building checked adress interior wasnt bad building holds hotels reception fist flour 4th flour floor renovated looked nice clean bath disliked wireless flour managed poor connection floor didnt network telephone wireless bad breakfast poor sweet cold cold croissants jam honey butter cereals cold milk bad cofee juice hated day hated day nice diversity sweet staff ok overall hotel limited budget cause rome expensive city

Reviews.Title: “Not too bad”
Reviews.Author: cactie
Reviews.Content: stayed 3 nights hotel little bit public transport walk 15 minutes metro station plazza republica termini 1st floor bathroom tiny shower hot cold water staff friendly restaurants hotel
